title: Caring Enough to Succeed: The Story of L.A. Dysart's in Pittsfield, Maine
description: Lawrence A. Dysart was a Department Store owner and innovator in a small town in Maine through the Great Depression, World War Two, and into the early 1970's. When most small stores were closing in the face of the shopping mall and big box store revolution, he continued to be successful. This book delves into the secrets to his success as well as a brief glimpse of small town America in the middle of the 20th Century.
author: Shane C. Gower
